urls.description: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs Environment, Food & Rural Affairs D irector of Floods and Water, Defra ‚Ä¢ Departmental Official Chair, Environment Agency ‚Ä¢ Representative of Organisation Chair, Highways England ‚Ä¢ Independent Member ‚Ä¢ sets the strategy, drives performance and holds the organisation to account; ‚Ä¢ provides stewardship for public funds and environmental outcomes. tweets.text:
A significant two-year project to refurbish seawalls on #CanveyIsland, Essex, will begin in 2022/23. Protecting homes and businesses from rising sea levels until 2070.

Improvements will also be made for seafront users. #floodaware

For more information: https://t.co/hNNDQ5CfAd https://t.co/NvFikn4cCx
